channel.title: Java
channel.description: hey guys im working on a source right now and i was wondering if anyone know how to make it so the *run.bat* can auto pick up what java u have....for example like near-reality, it doesnt matter if u have windows 7 32 or 64 bit they only have 1 run, can anyone link me to a tut on it or teach me how?
